title: Roche Pharma CEO on Company's Obesity Assets
description: Roche Pharma CEO Teresa Graham says that 2026 will be an important year for the company's obesity assets. She says that the company has spent the last couple years building out a comprehensive obesity profile. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Roche Pharma CEO Teresa Graham says that 2026 will be an important year for the company's obesity assets. She says that the company has spent the last couple years building out a comprehensive obesity profile. (Source: Bloomberg)
